name: Laser Fish (cpeyton78910)
description:
Laser Fish is  a small Scratch game made in less than 24 hours for SEAJAM!

How to Play

  • You can move up or down with arrow keys/ W & S
  • You can shoot lasers out of your eyes by clicking the space key but you need to wait 5 seconds in between shots
  • You gain points by shooting the garbage
  • You lose by getting hit by a piece of garbage

Background Music: https://soundcloud.com/user-909504386/milk-coffee-jazz
